Hey, I'm Milinda

I am a Computer Science PhD student at Indiana University and working as a research assistant in Data to Insight Center under the supervision of Prof. Beth Plale. Currently I’m working on a research related to moving scientific computations to Windows Azure.

In May 2008, I joined WSO2 Inc. and lead the WSO2 Business Process Server team till I move to Bloomington for my graduate studies. I was the founding developer of WSO2 Business Process Server and also involved in WSO2 Carbon and WSO2 Stratos projects.

I am a committer for Apache Axis and Apache ODE projects.

Get in touch with me on Twitter, Facebook or plain old-fashioned email.
